Sentence.sentence: Their leadership in the global economy was shaken.
first, the earthquake would shake metropolitan areas including Seattle and Portland.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The marketing is tempting: Get stronger muscles and healthier bodies with minimal effort by adding protein powder to your morning shake or juice drink.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"震动，颤抖"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: shake, tremble, shiver, quiver, vibrate, shudder
means: shake ： 最普通用词，含义广。指人或物不自主地颤动、摇摆，常侧重剧烈和无规律。
tremble ： 指由于寒冷、虚弱、愤怒或恐惧等而发抖、战栗。
shiver ： 指因寒冷或情绪突变而出现的短时间的轻微和快速的颤抖。
quiver ： 多用于指事物。指物体像乐器的弦一般地轻微而急速地颤动。
vibrate ： 指急速地连续震动，也指钟摆等的来回摆动。
shudder ： 着重指由于恐惧、震惊等而引起的全身突然而强烈地战栗。

list.explanation: (常用于祈使句)赶快，赶紧，加快速度

example.en: Shake a leg there! We'll never finish if you don't hurry up.
example.zh: 加快一点吧!要是你们不抓紧，我们就完不成了。

example.en: She told me to shake a leg,so I hurried the best I could.
example.zh: 她叫我加快速度，所以我就拼命地赶。

example.en: Let's shake a leg. The music's great.
example.zh: 咱们去跳舞吧。 这音乐很棒。

Sentence.sentence: After he steadied himself, he shook Glenn's mother's hand, and the inspection continued as though nothing had happened.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: As they left student life behind, many had a last drink at their cheap but friendly local bar, shook hands with longtime roommates, and moved out of small apartments into high buildings.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He can tremble wildly at an axe-murder, shake his head sympathetically and safely at a hurricane.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hoping that no one would notice that I was shaking inside, I threw my voice as far as it would reach: "Put your heads on the desks and close your eyes! We are going on a journey."
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I actually began to build up my arm muscles肌肉 shaking my set.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes this technique would not work, and I had to pick up the set and shake it to remove the sound.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The evening walk was a time to shake off the day's upsets and let the worry tracks in my head go to white noise.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The noise shakes the trees as the male beats his chest and charges toward me.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: When combined with berries of slices of other fruits, frozen bananas make an excellent base for thick, cooling fruit shakes and low fat "ice cream".
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: By offering on-trend items at dirt-cheap prices, Cline argues, these brands have hijacked fashion cycles, shaking an industry long accustomed to a seasonal pace.

means.word_mean: 摇动, 震动, 颠簸,抖动,颤动

sentences.en: Give the bottle a couple of shakes before pouring the juice.
sentences.cn: 倒果汁前先把瓶子摇动几下。

means.word_mean: 哆嗦, 发颤,颤抖,战栗

sentences.en: The shakes of the speaker's hands betrayed his nervousness.
sentences.cn: 发言者双手颤抖, 可见他很紧张。

means.word_mean: 奶昔（将牛奶或冰激凌与水果或香料混合或搅拌至起泡的饮料）
摇动, 摇撼, (使)颤抖

sentences.en: The earth shook under us.
sentences.cn: 大地在我们脚下震动。

sentences.en: In his anger he grasped the child and shook him violently.
sentences.cn: 愤怒之下, 他抓住孩子狠命地摇。

means.word_mean: 握手

sentences.en: He shook her hand warmly.
sentences.cn: 他热情地与她握手。

means.word_mean: 使心绪不宁[烦恼, 惊吓]

sentences.en: They were shaken badly by the news.
sentences.cn: 那消息令他们吃惊。

means.word_mean: 动摇; 减弱

sentences.en: Nothing can shake the basis for my belief.
sentences.cn: 什么也动摇不了我信念的基础。

means.word_mean: 摇头

sentences.en: He shook his head and said "I don't agree!"
sentences.cn: 他摇摇头说“我不同意！”

means.word_mean: 挥拳（威胁）
使非常震惊（或烦恼）
去除，摆脱
摇（出）；抖（掉）
（嗓音）颤抖
动摇</seg>

data.mean: shake sb↔off 摆脱，甩掉（某人）

fixed_phrase_list.en: 2.shake sb's hand/shake hands(with sb)/shake sb by the hand

sentence.cn: 雄鸟拍打着胸膛向我冲过来，声音震动了树木。
sentence.en: The noise shakes the trees as the male beats his chest and charges toward me.
sentence.from: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

sentence.cn: 他能在斧头下剧烈地颤抖，能在飓风中同情而又安全地摇头。
sentence.en: He can tremble wildly at an axe-murder, shake his head sympathetically and safely at a hurricane.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 任务型阅读 原文

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 受到严重打击的；心绪不宁的
可动摇的；可震动的；可摇动的

means.word_mean: 摇,摇动;抖动;震动
其他释义

phrase.cizu_name: get (或 give ) someone a fair shake

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)get (or give someone) just treatment or a fair chance

lj.lj_ly: I do not believe he gave the industry a fair shake.
lj.lj_ls: 我不相信他公正地对待了该产业。

phrase.cizu_name: in two shakes (of a lamb's tail)

lj.lj_ly: I'll be back to you in two shakes.

phrase.cizu_name: more —— than one can shake a stick at

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to emphasize the largeness of an amount

lj.lj_ly: a team with more experience than you can shake a stick at.
it is no great shakes as a piece of cinema.
lj.lj_ls: 作为一部影片它没有什么特别的。

phrase.cizu_name: shake the dust off one's feet

jx.jx_cn_mean: 愤怒地离开；轻蔑地离开

phrase.cizu_name: shake hands (with someone) (或 shake someone by the

jx.jx_en_mean: clasp someone's right hand in one's own at meeting or parting, in reconciliation or congratulation, or as a sign of agreement
turn one's head from side to side in order to indicate refusal, denial, disapproval, or incredulity
jx.jx_cn_mean: 摇头（表示拒绝、否认、不赞成或怀疑）

lj.lj_ly: she shook her head in disbelief.

phrase.cizu_name: shake (或 quake) in one's shoes (或 boots)

jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)向某人敲诈钱财

jx.jx_en_mean: cause something to fall or settle by shaking
get away from someone by shaking their grip loose
successfully deal with or recover from an illness or injury

lj.lj_ly: Sheedy has shaken off a calf injury.

entry.def: If you shake something, you hold it and move it quickly backwards and forwards or up and down. You can also shake a person, for example, because you are angry with them or because you want them to wake up.

example.ex: The nurse shook the thermometer and put it under my armpit...
example.tran: 护士把体温计甩了甩，然后放到了我的腋下。

example.ex: Shake the rugs well and hang them for a few hours before replacing on the floor...
example.tran: 把地毯好好抖抖，挂起来晾上几小时再铺到地板上。

entry.def: If you shake yourself or your body, you make a lot of quick, small, repeated movements without moving from the place where you are.
entry.tran: 摇动，抖动(身体或身体部位)

example.ex: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself...
example.tran: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。

example.ex: He shook his hands to warm them up.
example.tran: 他摇动双手让它们暖和起来。

entry.def: If you shake your head, you turn it from side to side in order to say 'no' or to show disbelief or sadness.
entry.tran: 摇头(表示拒绝、怀疑或难过)

example.ex: 'Anything else?' Colum asked. Kathryn shook her head wearily...
example.tran: “还有别的吗?”科拉姆问。凯瑟琳疲惫地摇了摇头。

example.ex: We were amazed, shocked, dumbfounded, shaking our heads in disbelief.
example.tran: 我们震惊、愕然、目瞪口呆，难以置信地摇着头。

entry.def: If you are shaking, or a part of your body is shaking, you are making quick, small movements that you cannot control, for example because you are cold or afraid.
entry.tran: (因为寒冷或害怕而)发抖，颤抖，战栗，哆嗦

example.ex: He roared with laughter, shaking in his chair...
example.tran: 他放声大笑，笑得身子在椅子上直颤。

example.ex: My hand shook so much that I could hardly hold the microphone...
example.tran: 我的手抖得如此厉害，几乎都拿不住麦克风了。

entry.def: If you have the shakes, your body is shaking a lot because you are afraid or ill, or because you have drunk too much alcohol.
entry.tran: (因害怕、生病或喝醉酒而产生的)颤抖，战栗，哆嗦

example.ex: Another man constantly chain-smoked and seemed to have the shakes.
example.tran: 另一名男子一直一支接一支地抽烟，似乎身体有些发抖。

entry.def: If you shake your fist or an object such as a stick at someone, you wave it in the air in front of them because you are angry with them.
entry.tran: (因愤怒而)挥动,舞动(拳头、棍子等)

example.ex: The colonel rushed up to Earle, shaking his gun at him...
example.tran: 上校冲向厄尔，朝他挥着枪。

example.ex: The protesters burst through police lines into the cathedral square, shaking clenched fists.
example.tran: 抗议者冲破警方封锁线来到教堂广场上，挥舞着愤怒的拳头。

entry.def: If a force shakes something, or if something shakes, it moves from side to side or up and down with quick, small, but sometimes violent movements.

example.ex: ...an explosion that shook buildings several kilometers away...
example.tran: 使几公里以外的建筑物都感觉到震动的爆炸

example.ex: The hiccups may shake your baby's body from head to foot...
example.tran: 打嗝可能会让宝宝从头到脚地颤。

entry.def: To shake something into a certain place or state means to bring it into that place or state by moving it quickly up and down or from side to side.

example.ex: Small insects can be collected by shaking them into a jar...
example.tran: 收集小昆虫时可以把它们装进广口瓶里。

example.ex: She frees her mass of hair from a rubber band and shakes it off her shoulders...
example.tran: 她解开橡皮筋，将浓密的头发披散在肩头。

entry.def: If your voice is shaking, you cannot control it properly and it sounds very unsteady, for example because you are nervous or angry.

example.ex: His voice shaking with rage, he asked how the committee could keep such a report from the public.
example.tran: 他气得声音发抖，质问委员会这样一份报告怎么能向公众隐瞒。

entry.def: If an event or a piece of news shakes you, or shakes your confidence, it makes you feel upset and unable to think calmly.

example.ex: The news of Tandy's escape had shaken them all...
example.tran: 坦迪逃跑的消息让他们所有人都无比震惊。

example.ex: She was close to both of her parents and was undeniably shaken by their divorce...
example.tran: 她和父母的关系都很亲近，因此毫无疑问，他们的离婚对她打击很大。

entry.def: If an event shakes a group of people or their beliefs, it causes great uncertainty and makes them question their beliefs.

example.ex: It won't shake the football world if we beat Torquay...
example.tran: 即便我们击败了托基队也不能撼动足球界。

example.ex: When events happen that shake these beliefs, our fear takes control...
example.tran: 当一些事情的发生动摇这些信念时，恐惧就会占据我们的心灵。

entry.def: If you shake someone out of an attitude or belief that you disapprove of, you cause them to change their attitude or belief to one that is more responsible or sensible.
entry.tran: 使摒弃，使改变(态度、信念)

example.ex: No amount of reasoning could shake him out of his conviction...
example.tran: 再怎样跟他讲道理都不能让他放弃自己认准的事。

example.ex: Many businessmen still find it hard to shake themselves out of the old state-dependent habit.
example.tran: 很多商人发现自己仍然很难摆脱依赖政府的老习惯。

entry.def: A shake is the same as a milkshake .

example.ex: He sent his driver to fetch him a strawberry shake.
example.tran: 他让司机去给他买一杯草莓奶昔。

entry.def: If you do not get a fair shake, you are not given a reasonable opportunity to succeed or to achieve something.

example.ex: A lot of people think that they're not going to get a fair shake from the courts.
example.tran: 很多人认为他们在法庭上不会受到公平的审判。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is no great shakes, you mean that they are not very skilful or effective.
entry.tran: 技术不高的;不出色的;无效的

example.ex: I'm no great shakes as a detective...
example.tran: 作为一名侦探我并不出色。

example.ex: The protests have failed partly because the opposition politicians are  no great shakes.
example.tran: 抗议失败了，部分原因是因为反对派政治家们并未发挥积极作用。

entry.def: If you shake someone's hand or shake someone by the hand, you shake hands with them.

example.ex: I said congratulations and walked over to him and shook his hand...
example.tran: 我向他表示祝贺，并走过去和他握手。

example.ex: The Secretary emerged, a big fat man who quickly shook us all by the hand.
example.tran: 这位大臣现身了，是一个大块头，他迅速和我们所有人都握了手。

entry.def: If you shake hands with someone, you take their right hand in your own for a few moments, often moving it up and down slightly, when you are saying hello or goodbye to them, congratulating them, or agreeing on something. You can also say that two people shake hands .
entry.tran: (打招呼、道别、道贺或表示赞同时)与…握手

example.ex: He nodded greetings to Mary Ann and Michael and shook hands with Burke...
example.tran: 他向玛丽·安及迈克尔点头致意，并和伯克握了手。

example.ex: We shook hands and parted on good terms.
example.tran: 我们握了握手，然后祝福道别。

means.word_mean: 1. building material used as siding or roofing
2. frothy drink of milk and flavoring and sometimes fruit or ice cream
3. a note that alternates rapidly with another note a semitone above it
4. grasping and shaking a person's hand (as to acknowledge an introduction or to agree on a contract)
5. reflex shaking caused by cold or fear or excitement
6. causing to move repeatedly from side to side
1. move or cause to move back and forth;
2. move with or as if with a tremor;
3. shake or vibrate rapidly and intensively;
4. move back and forth or sideways;

sentences.sentence: "She rocked back and forth on her feet"

means.word_mean: 5. undermine or cause to waver;
6. stir the feelings, emotions, or peace of;
7. get rid of;

sentences.sentence: "I couldn't shake the car that was following me"

means.word_mean: 8. bring to a specified condition by or as if by shaking;

sentences.sentence: "shake the salt out of the salt shaker"

means.word_mean: 9. shake (a body part) to communicate a greeting, feeling, or cognitive state;

sentences.sentence: "She shook her finger at the naughty students"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sc(e)acan (verb), of Germanic origin

sentences.cn: 这件事动摇了她对他的信心。
sentences.en: The incident had shaken her faith in him.

sentences.cn: 这个声明必将动摇这一行业的信心。
sentences.en: This announcement is bound to shake the confidence of the industry.

sentences.cn: 当一些事情的发生动摇这些信念时，恐惧就会占据我们的心灵。
sentences.en: When events happen that shake these beliefs, our fear takes control...

sentences.cn: 人们对国家的财政制度不仅动摇, 甚至完全丧失了.
sentences.en: Confidence in the nation's financial was shaken, even shattered.

sentences.cn: 人们对国家的金融系统的信心动摇, 甚至彻底丧失, 接着西部地区的银行开始倒闭.
sentences.en: Confidence in the nation's financial system was shaken, even shattered, and Western banks began to close.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 政府文件

sentences.cn: 那次惨败动摇了这支部队的士气.
sentences.en: The terrible defeat has shaken the army morale.

sentences.cn: 他也会降至你们的根柢,动摇你们紧紧依附着大地的根须.
sentences.en: So shall he descend to your roots and shake them in their clinging to the earth.

sentences.cn: 不少领导面临诱惑信念动摇, 不能做到洁心 、 慎欲.
sentences.en: Many leaders are faced with alluring belief to shake, cannot accomplish clean heart, careful desire.

sentences.cn: 什么也动摇不了我信念的基础.
sentences.en: Nothing can shake the basis for my belief.

sentences.cn: 美元正遭受戏剧性下跌,这将动摇美国的资产者的信心.
sentences.en: The currency could suffer a dramatic fall that would shake confidence in American assets.

sentences.cn: 队伍动摇了, 但未崩溃.
sentences.en: The ranks were shaken, but not broken.

sentences.cn: 动摇是一个粗拙的时间坡度的结果 ( 时间片 ).
sentences.en: Shaking is the result of a coarse time gradient ( time slice ).

sentences.cn: 此事未动摇他的坚定的决心.
sentences.en: This did not shake his firm resolve.

sentences.cn: 他的决心是怎么也动摇不了的.
sentences.en: His resolution is not to be shaken by anything.

sentences.cn: 基本路线要管一百年, 动摇不得.
sentences.en: Main line should is in charge of centenary, shake to be not gotten.

sentences.cn: 但在世界各地的创伤性事件,动摇了这个假设,从来没有过.
sentences.en: But the traumatic events around the world have shaken that assumption as never before.

sentences.cn: 这即可能摧毁整个公司, 还动摇了整个世界的金融业.
sentences.en: This could destroy the company as a whole, but also shaken the world's financial industry.

sentences.cn: 我的信仰动摇了.
sentences.en: My faith has been shaken.

sentences.cn: 他们的任何行动都不会改变或者动摇我们国家的意志.
sentences.en: No act of theirs can alter the course or shake the resolve of this country.

sentences.cn: 中心反复强调, 农业的基础地位任何时候都不能动摇.
sentences.en: Emphasize repeatedly in the center of, fundamental position of agriculture any moment cannot shake.

sentences.cn: 处于政权更替期的美国的领导力发生动摇也是一个问题.
sentences.en: Regime change a period of the U.S. leadership is shaken a problem.

sentences.cn: 应该等到希望出场的空方难受、动摇,纷纷离场时, 再一跃入场.
sentences.en: Wait until they get and shaken out, then jump in while no one is watching.

sentences.cn: 她动摇了她的决心.
sentences.en: She shook her firm resolve.

sentences.cn: 但是,冲突造成大量平民和安全力量伤亡,公众信心进一步动摇.
sentences.en: But civilians and security already been killed and public confidence shaking further.

sentences.cn: 这一政治丑闻从根本上动摇了该国家.
sentences.en: The political scandal shook the nation to its very foundations.

sentences.cn: 在很多国家, 对本国货币的信心已经严重动摇.
sentences.en: In many countries, confidence in the local currency has been severely shaken.

sentences.cn: 这些呼啸的寒风如此刺骨,但您却一点动摇的感觉都没有殿下,您还好 吗 ?
sentences.en: This howling wind cuts to the bone and you're not even shaking. Milord are you alright?

sentences.cn: 但是,这些变化并未从根本上动摇英国的社会结构.
sentences.en: But the English social structure was not thoroughly shaken by these changes.

sentences.cn: 首先, 纽约—泛欧交易所已经声称要动摇欧洲的定价.
sentences.en: For one thing, NYSE Euronext has vowed to shake up pricing in Europe.

sentences.cn: 您有手指本钱和电影,而且新想法动摇和浇注.
sentences.en: You have finger swipes and flicks but also the novel ideas of shaking and pouring.

sentences.cn: 她摇摇头，不相信。
sentences.en: She shook her head in disbelief.

sentences.cn: 他坚定地摇了摇头，否定了那个想法。
sentences.en: He dismissed the idea with a firm shake of his head (= turning it from side to side to mean ‘no ’) .

sentences.cn: 他一进来，狗就开始摇头摆尾。
sentences.en: As soon as he got inside, the dog shook himself...

sentences.cn: “还有别的吗?”科拉姆问。凯瑟琳疲惫地摇了摇头。
sentences.en: 'Anything else?' Colum asked. Kathryn shook her head wearily...

sentences.cn: 这个家伙很顽固地摇头.
sentences.en: The bloke shook his head stubbornly.

sentences.cn: 她的回答是摇摇头.
sentences.en: A shake of the head was her answer.

sentences.cn: 几个人摇了摇头,意识到救援“两房”好像已经是很久以前的事了.
sentences.en: Several staffers shook as they realized how far away the Fannie and Freddie rescue seemed.

sentences.cn: 她对这个意见直摇头.
sentences.en: She shook her head at the idea.

sentences.cn: Mareccu慢慢地在它的荒谬摇头全部.
sentences.en: Mareccu slowly shook his head at the absurdity of it all.

sentences.cn: 丈夫摇摇头: “ 没用的, 我把眼镜给忘在家里了. ”
sentences.en: The husband shake one's head: " Trashy, I give glasses forget to be in the home. "

sentences.cn: 这位工作人员笑着摇摇头.
sentences.en: The worker smiles and shakes her head.

sentences.cn: 他仔细地读了好几遍, 然后摇了摇头.
sentences.en: He read it through carefully several times, and then merely shook his head.

sentences.cn: 迪希先生摇了摇头.
sentences.en: Mr Deasy shook his head.

sentences.cn: 他摇了摇头,眼睛先是睁得圆圆的, 随后又眯成一条缝,脸上露出愤怒的神色.
sentences.en: He shook his head and his eyes were wide, then narrowed in indignation.

sentences.cn: 利迪娅大笑,摇摇头. 除了夸大妄想外,你没有忍受任何痛苦.
sentences.en: Lydia laughed and shook her head. Youre not suffering from anything but delusions of grandeur.

sentences.en: She sipped her cosmopolitan and shake her head sadly.

sentences.cn: 他打了几个电话,然后对桑儿直摇头.
sentences.en: He called a few times and then shook his head at Sonny.

sentences.cn: 克郎邱先生放心了, 但是又疑惑而庄重地摇摇头.
sentences.en: Mr. Gruncher was soothed , but shook his head in a dubious and moral way.

sentences.cn: 他又摇摇头, 一小缕头发贴上他满是皱纹的前额.
sentences.en: He shook his head again, and a lock of thin hair settled across his wrinkled forehead.

sentences.cn: 他围着铁塔, 这边看看,那边瞧瞧, 有时摇摇头笑笑, 有时又嘟嘟囔囔.
sentences.en: He around the Eiffel Tower, look herelook over there, sometimes shaking his head smiled, sometimes Dudunangnang.

sentences.cn: 他悲伤地摇摇头, 为自己的遭遇而自怜.
sentences.en: He shook his head sorrowfully, pitying himself for what had been done to him.

sentences.cn: 桑儿摇摇头.
sentences.en: Sonny shook his head.

sentences.cn: 达西摇摇头,表示默认.
sentences.en: Darcy shook his head in acquiescence.

sentences.en: The Knave shook his head sadly.'Do I look like it?'he said.

sentences.cn: 他摇摇头,这让我感到一阵轻松.
sentences.en: He shakes his head and relief washes over me.

sentences.cn: 她放下电话, 叹着气, 惋惜地摇了摇头.
sentences.en: She put down the phone, sighed, and shook her head sadly.

sentences.cn: 玛金笑了笑,很不以为然地摇了摇头.
sentences.en: Ma Chin laughed and shook her head disbelievingly.

sentences.cn: 摇头表示否认.
sentences.en: Shaking the head is a sign of negation.

sentences.cn: 在意大利，人们见面时握手吗？
sentences.en: Do people in Italy shake hands when they meet?

sentences.cn: 他们达成了协议，相互握手祝贺。
sentences.en: They shook hands on the deal (= to show that they had reached an agreement) .

sentences.cn: 主人热情地和我们每个人握手。
sentences.en: Our host shook each of us warmly by the hand.

sentences.cn: 他们达成了协议，相互握手祝贺。
sentences.en: They shook on the deal.

sentences.cn: 让我们握手庆贺取得一致。
sentences.en: Let's shake on it .

sentences.cn: 我向他表示祝贺，并走过去和他握手。
sentences.en: I said congratulations and walked over to him and shook his hand...

sentences.cn: 我们握了握手，然后祝福道别。
sentences.en: We shook hands and parted on good terms.

sentences.cn: 他同聚集在主席台四周的人热情握手.
sentences.en: He warmly shook hands with those gathered around the rostrum.

sentences.cn: 希斯克利夫, 至少握握手吧!
sentences.en: I could not hinder myself : Heathcliff , shake hands at least!

sentences.cn: 有力的握手, 清楚的谈吐.
sentences.en: Powerful shake hands, clear style of conversation.

sentences.cn: 赫伯尔特万分高兴,我们握了握手,表示一言为定.
sentences.en: Herbet was highly delighted when we shook hands on this arrangement.

sentences.cn: 下场后他拒绝与曼奇尼握手, 从此被打入冷宫.
sentences.en: After the end he refused to shake hands with Mancini , has already been shelved since been.

sentences.cn: 那次握手是将体育商业化的革命.
sentences.en: It was a hand shake which was to revolutionize the economics of sports.

sentences.cn: 他热情地跟我握手.
sentences.en: He grasped my hand warmly , ie to shake it.

sentences.cn: 作为友好的一个标志,在回家前, 队员们相互握手.
sentences.en: As a sign of good sportsmanship, the players shake and soon after that everybody goes home.

sentences.cn: 我们握手、交谈,仿佛世界上任何事也没有发生.
sentences.en: We shook hands and talked as if nothing else in the world was going on.

sentences.cn: 实地教学返回时, 要与每位陪同老师握手告别.
sentences.en: When returning from a trip, shake the hand of every chaperone.

sentences.cn: 我们最后以握手表示达成了协议.
sentences.en: We sealed our agreement by shaking hands.

sentences.cn: 握手告别时,我为自己的糊涂道了歉.
sentences.en: As we shook hands I apologized for my stupidity.

sentences.cn: (当被点到时),麦凯恩精神抖擞地出列,敬礼,并和美军官员握手.
sentences.en: McCain briskly walks up to salute and shake hands with U.S. military officers.

sentences.cn: 她一边凝视着他的眼睛, 一边象男人般大大方方地跟他握手.
sentences.en: She looked at him straight in the eyes as she shook hands, frankly, like a man.

sentences.cn: 吉尔突然抓住我的手,热情地和我握手.
sentences.en: Gill seized my hand and shook it heartily.

sentences.cn: 我与他握手.
sentences.en: I shook his hand.

sentences.cn: 当女性接吻之际, 常使我想起职业拳师们的握手礼.
sentences.en: When women kiss, it always reminds me of prize fighters shaking hands.

sentences.cn: 主人抓住我的手,热情地和我握手.
sentences.en: The host seized my hand and shook it heartily.

sentences.cn: 他含着幸福的眼泪欢迎阿尔芒, 亲切地和我握手.
sentences.en: He welcomed Armand with tears of happiness, and shook my hand affectionately.

sentences.cn: 他们握了握手马上开始谈话.
sentences.en: They shook hands and opened a conversation instantly.

sentences.cn: 克拉克先生和桑迪与她热情握手.
sentences.en: Mr Clark and Sandy shook her hand warmly.

sentences.cn: 表演前,她紧张得浑身颤抖不已.
sentences.en: She was so nervous before the performance that she was shaking like a jelly.

sentences.cn: 我问, 手开始颤抖.
sentences.en: I asked, as my hand began to shake.

sentences.cn: 当我无法自控地在战壕中颤抖时, 我看见了你的身影.
sentences.en: Not even as I shook and trembled uncontrollably in the trenches , did I forget your face.

sentences.cn: 约翰从她颤抖的手中接过稿子,扶她在椅子上坐下.
sentences.en: John took the manuscript from her shaking hands and seated her in a chair.

sentences.cn: 她歇斯底里地抽泣着, 她瘦弱的身体哭得直颤抖.
sentences.en: She sobbed hysterically, and her thin body was shaken.

sentences.cn: 老人的手不停地颤抖.
sentences.en: The old man's hands shook constantly.

sentences.cn: 他们制造了非常大的爆炸,就声音而言, 好象整个世界在颤抖.
sentences.en: They cause a very huge explosion in terms of sound, as if the universe was shaken.

sentences.cn: 最后我把车子开走, 心里仍然颤抖, 精神上却满是谦卑.
sentences.en: Finally I drove away, shaken in mind, humbled in spirit.

sentences.cn: 我发哆嗦和颤抖就像是一片摇晃的树叶.
sentences.en: I dudder and shake like an aspen leaf.

sentences.cn: 她激动得声音 颤抖.
sentences.en: Her voice shook [ quaked ] with emotion.

sentences.cn: 听到枪响, 我们都静静地站着,因为害怕而颤抖着.
sentences.en: When we heard the gun fire, we all stood still and shook with fear.

sentences.cn: 他宣布这一消息时,声音 ( 因激动 ) 有些颤抖.
sentences.en: His voice shook ( with emotion ) as he announced the news.

sentences.cn: 发言者双手颤抖,可见他很紧张.
sentences.en: The shakes of the speaker's hands betrayed his nervousness.

sentences.cn: 女士听到那不详的声音,开始在她同伴的膝上颤抖.
sentences.en: The lady shook upon her companion's knees as she heard that boding sound.

sentences.cn: 我站在那里,因为害怕而哭泣着,颤抖着.
sentences.en: I stood there crying and shaking with fear.

sentences.cn: 每当她走进教室, 我们就觉得背开始发僵,两腿开始颤抖.
sentences.en: If she walked into classroom, our backs would stiffen and our knees would start to shake.

sentences.cn: 我捡起了那只颤抖着的小猫.
sentences.en: I picked up the shaking kitten.

sentences.cn: 我的心在猛烈跳动,身子在不住颤抖.
sentences.en: My heart is throbbing and I'm shaking.

sentences.cn: 赫敏凭空变出了一个瓶子塞进了哈利颤抖的手中.
sentences.en: A flask, conjured from thin air, was thrust into his shaking hands by Hermione.

sentences.cn: 然而, 男孩颤抖晃动得更厉害了, 血红的眼睛似乎在受着阵阵抽搐的煎熬.
sentences.en: Still, the youth's shaking had worsened; his reddened eyes seemed afflicted with fluttery tics.

sentences.cn: 宇宙颤抖着,隆隆作响.
sentences.en: The universe boomed and shook.

sentences.cn: 闪电冲击到地面各个地方, 地面也在颤抖.
sentences.en: The ground was shaking from the lightning's blows, which fell here and there all around.

sentences.cn: 别再喊了! 求求你, " 她低声说着, 嗓子在颤抖.
sentences.en: Please , doan holler agin!'she whispered, her voice shaking.

sentences.cn: 我吓得浑身颤抖.
sentences.en: I was shaking with fright.

sentences.en: She knotted the ends with fingers that bled from blisters and shook from fatigue.

sentences.cn: 哈罗德的双手颤抖, 摸索着把眼镜戴上.
sentences.en: Harold fumblingly, with shaking hands, put them on.

sentences.cn: 他们可能因此而高体温 、 头疼 、 颤抖及至死亡.
sentences.en: They may suffer from high body temperature, head pain, shaking and even death.

sentences.cn: 他用颤抖的手写下那些字.
sentences.en: He traced the words with a shaking hand.

sentences.cn: 这位学生精力集中,眉头紧皱 - 他思考, 他流汗, 他因努力而颤抖.
sentences.en: The student frowns in deep concentration -- he thinks, he sweats, he shakes with effort.

sentences.cn: 他摇动双手让它们暖和起来。
sentences.en: He shook his hands to warm them up.

sentences.en: You have shaken the land and torn it open ; mend its fractures , for quaking.

sentences.cn: 地震就是剧烈摇动或震动.

sentences.en: He shook a sheet of metal to simulate the noise of thunder.

sentences.cn: 你听见没有, 他在轻轻地摇动那拴门的链子?
sentences.en: Do you hear, he is gently shaking the chain which fastens the door?

sentences.en: Linda shook up the bottle of orange juice before she drank it.

sentences.cn: 〔震天的摇滚乐从客厅传来,整座房子似乎都在摇动.
sentences.en: Rock music blasted from the hall and the whole building to be shaking.

sentences.en: By rocking the branch of the tree the boy thought he could shake down an apple.

sentences.en: She angrily vibrate the body, making the body strong shaking with, an earthquake!

sentences.cn: 他只是一个新手骑兵,而且他当然以惊骇摇动.

sentences.en: She ran to the door and shook the handle impotently.

sentences.en: Bubbles: Photograph water in a backlit glass bottle and shake it up first to create bubbles.

sentences.en: The nurse shook up the contents of the medicine bottle before giving the patient a dose.

sentences.en: Ken's beer hit the ground the bottle shattering as he stood, shaking.

sentences.en: It can result from a hit to the head, sudden stop in movement or violent shaking.

sentences.en: You have shaken the land and torn it open ; mend its fractures , for quaking.

sentences.en: They hurried across the shaking earth to the village of Paricutin, which was near their farm.

sentences.en: At first, I felt a sight shaking through my body.

sentences.cn: 1混合时必须用 地脚 螺栓安装在混凝土基础上,以保证工作时不致有震动.
sentences.en: Should be installed on fixed ( mixed ) concrete foundation with anchor bolt to ensure ni shaking ( viberation ) during ( when ) working.

sentences.cn: 数可看见负责被震动了,并且许多是眼泪汪汪的,因为李被赞美了.
sentences.en: Several in attendance were visibly shaken and many were tearful as Li was eulogized.

sentences.cn: 脑震荡是当脑子在颅骨中被震动时所造成的伤害.
sentences.en: A concussion is an injury that happens when the brain is shaken inside the skull.

sentences.cn: 喷出的烟雾和惊乎声足以震动钢铁般的神经.
sentences.en: The smoke and shouting were enough to shake nerves of steel.

sentences.cn: 无震动和脱落现象.
sentences.en: The nothing shakes and comes off phenomenon.

sentences.cn: 烘焙一个蛋糕, 抓条蛇, 震动你的腿,然后打个蛋.
sentences.en: Bake a cake, Catch a snake, Shake your leg And break an egg.

sentences.cn: 爆炸震动了屋子.
sentences.en: The explosion shook the house.

sentences.cn: 24我观看大山, 见大山尽都震动, 小山也都摇来摇去.
sentences.en: I looked at the mountains, and there they were, shaking, And all the hills were swaying.

sentences.cn: 淘汰选矿,筛选用震动筛矿器分离或清洗 ( 矿石 )
sentences.en: To separate or clean ( ore ) by shaking a jig.

sentences.cn: 因呼喊者的声音,门槛的根基震动,殿充满了烟云.
sentences.en: At the sound of and thresholds shook and the temple with smoke.

sentences.cn: 最后, 声音和震动结束了.
sentences.en: Finally, the noise and shaking ended.

sentences.cn: 我能感觉到地面在轻微地震动.
sentences.en: I can feel the ground shaking slightly.

sentences.cn: 震动的影响地面像地震.
sentences.en: The impact shook ground like an earthquake.

sentences.cn: 我双眼噙满泪水, 幼小的心灵受到了一次极大的震动.
sentences.en: I full tear of double eye hold in mouth or eyes , little heart got huge shakes.

sentences.cn: 因为天上的窗户都开了,地的根基也震动了.
sentences.en: The flood gates of the heavens are opened the foundations of the earth shake.

sentences.cn: 心中平安地坐在这里, 哪怕是地球正在震动而天空正在刮风.
sentences.en: Sit here in a place of peace, even as the Earth shakes and the sky rattles.

sentences.cn: 保护层容易因震动或干裂的发展及木工处理受到损害.
sentences.en: The protection can be readily damaged by the development of shakes or splits and by woodworking.

sentences.cn: 最近大盘在宽幅震动, 你最好在这个阶段学习一下股票知识,再选股.
sentences.en: Grail shakes in wide cut recently, you had better learn stock knowledge in this phase, reelection.

sentences.cn: 18你的雷声在旋风中;电光照亮世界; 大地战抖震动.
sentences.en: The voice of thy thunder was in lightnings lightened the world: the earth trembled and shook.

sentences.cn: 大卡车驶过时,连房基都震动了.
sentences.en: The huge lorries shook the foundations of the house.

sentences.cn: 大地在我们脚下震动.
sentences.en: The earth shook under us.

sentences.cn: 地震的损害程度由地震震级、持续时间以及震动频率决定.
sentences.en: The destruction an earthquake causes depends on its magnitude and duration, or of shaking that occurs.

sentences.cn: 肖恩一意识到大厦在震动就马上走出去了.
sentences.en: Sean left the building as as he realized it was shaking.

sentences.cn: 我像树叶似的直哆嗦。
sentences.en: I was shaking like a leaf .

sentences.cn: 她的手早已哆嗦起来。
sentences.en: Her hands had started to shake.

sentences.cn: 罪犯面对法庭吓得直哆嗦.
sentences.en: The criminal shook with fear as he faced the court.

sentences.cn: 你感觉到冷,身体就会开始哆嗦, 虽然不是很严重,但却无法控制.
sentences.en: You feel so cold that your body starts to shake, not very much but uncontrollably.

sentences.cn: 我发哆嗦和颤抖就像是一片摇晃的树叶.
sentences.en: I dudder and shake like an aspen leaf.

sentences.cn: 我哆哆嗦嗦地伸手从大衣里摸出了我的诺基亚.
sentences.en: My fingers shook as I reached into my coat and fumbled for my Nokia.

sentences.cn: 他吓得直哆嗦,就好像看见了鬼一样.
sentences.en: He was shaking with fright as if he had seen a ghost.

sentences.cn: 熊边咳嗽边打着哆嗦. 它仍然不舒服.
sentences.en: Bear shakes and he shivers . He coughs and he quivers . And he still fees sick.

sentences.cn: 当吉尔在黑暗中听到身后有脚步声时,吓得浑身哆嗦.
sentences.en: Gill shook like a leaf when she heard the footsteps behind her in the dark.

sentences.cn: 他好像半身不遂地哆嗦着.
sentences.en: He shook as with a palsy.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 热爱生命

sentences.cn: 那条大狗向他走去时他吓得直哆嗦.
sentences.en: He was shaking in his shoes as the large dog moved towards him.

sentences.cn: 尽管我没有做过什么坏事,但见了警察,我总吓得两腿直打哆嗦.
sentences.en: Policemen always make me shake in my shoes, even when I've done nothing wrong.

sentences.cn: 那你为什么哆嗦得这么厉害?
sentences.en: Then why are you shaking so much?

sentences.cn: 吉米从学校回到家里时, 冻得直打哆嗦.
sentences.en: When Jimmy got home form school, he was shaking like a leaf from the cold.

sentences.cn: 他耸耸肩: 他自己真的哆嗦了一下, 好象他憎恶得不寒而栗.
sentences.en: He shrugged his shoulders: shook himself, indeed, as if his flesh crept with aversion.

sentences.cn: 当哆哆嗦嗦的金姆回头走向她失去了生气的朋友身旁时, 里克从她身后一把抓住了她.
sentences.en: When a shaken Kim turns back to her friend's lifeless body, Rick grabs her from behind.

sentences.cn: 我发现自己冷得不由自主地哆嗦.
sentences.en: I found myself shaking uncontrollably with cold.

sentences.cn: 是的.我要一个汉堡包和一份巧克力混合饮料.
sentences.en: B . Yes. I'd like a hamburger and a chocolate shake.

sentences.cn: 好的, 一个汉堡包, 一大份炸薯条, 一份巧克力混合饮料.
sentences.en: Okay. That's a hamburger, a large order of french fries, and a chocolate shake.

Sentence.sentence: Do your contacts share your point of view on most subjects? If yes, it's time  to shake things up.
Just as internet shopping forced Wal-mart and Tesco to adapt, so online sharing will shake up transport, tourism, equipment-hire and more
Moreover, the participants reported feeling more full when they thought they'd consumed a higher-calorie shake
You would not be surprised if a stranger tried to shake hands when you were introduced, but you might be a little startled if they bowed, started to stroke you or kissed you on both cheeks.
If yes, it's time to shake things up .
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C
